Class TreePaneMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • TreePaneMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schedulable, TabbedPaneActivator

    public class TreePaneMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable, TabbedPaneActivator
    Handles all display of trees, but NOT their geometry (geometry is stored in the nodes themselves). Does colors, line drawing, node selection... Now has normal jpanel and new openGL versions. In the process of switching wholy to GL but may leave other stuff as backup/debugging. If this is flagged as a slave panel, it is meant for displaying subtrees only.
    Author:
    Matt
